name: Beeline (poopfireshots)
description:
A vertical endless flappy bird (bee?) like game.

Player can move around using AD for left and right movement respectively. S to slow down ascent.

Space to jump. Keep tapping to hover.

The goal is to reach as high of a floor as you can while maintaining health.

There are heart shaped health drops that add health and every collision lowers health.

Flower drops:

Green - Jump Boost

Red - Jump Decrease

Yellow - SuperBee (invincible)

Press Escape at any point to return to menu.
